body:
Hello everyone,

I would like to introduce a series of surveys created to gather feedback from the community to improve the staff team.
I just spent 20 minutes just working on that sentence, ugh I have no life ;-;

Anyway, expect these to be created fairly frequently, please take these surveys when you can. It'll really help us improve as a team and you'll get the improvements you want! :)

  ⋙Staff Apps Sept-Oct 2015 https://blizzem.typeform.com/to/dPzph6

Please fill the survey out honestly; all responses are anonymous. If we find you trolling the survey, you'll be punished.

Kind regards,
Aura

title: Community Survey #1 - Staff Apps

replies.body: Thanks for the many responses! More are welcome.
